caption.p: (a) Shannon-Weiner Index of bacteria community; (b) Bray-Curtis similarity of the bacteria community structure as indicated by Non-metric multidimensional scaling analysis (NMDS); (c) Bray-Curtis similarity of the bacteria community structure, Wilcoxon Rank test were used to invaded and uninvaded pairs, ** and *** indicate significant differences at 0.05 and 0.01 probability level; (d) Bacterial communities composition in invaded and uninvaded soil of five land-use type. A, farmland; B, forest; C, orchard; D, wasteland; E, waterfront. I represent invaded soil; N represent uninvaded soil.
